FuncDef: To configure the dead-time interval for a RADIUS or TACACS+ server group, use the deadtime command. To revert to the default, use the no form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: Number of minutes for the interval. The range is from 0 to 1440 minutes. Setting the dead-time interval to 0 disables the timer.

Examples: switch(config)# aaa group server radius RadServer
switch(config)# aaa group server tacacs+ TacServer
switch(config)# aaa group server tacacs+ TacServer
ExtraInfo:
You must use the feature tacacs+ command before you configure TACACS.
Command Default:0 minutes
